reviews.content: They took the time to explain the historical significance of my antique pieces and provided a thorough valuation process.

content.about: San Francisco Antique Appraisals provides professional antique appraisal services in the San Francisco area with expertise in antique furniture, collectibles, fine art, and estate items. We offer thorough, accurate valuations for insurance, estate planning, charitable donations, and more.
content.notes: Serving the greater metropolitan area with professional antique appraisal services.
